Package auxiliary

Class Auxiliary

java.lang.Object
auxiliary.Auxiliary
public class Auxiliary extends Object
Version:
Last refactored on 12.06.2022

This class holds methods not logically or thematically coherent with other packages of the programme.

Author:
Martin Kadlec

    Method

    static void
    sanitizeStats()
    Auxiliary function used for testing move to auxiliary package for reusability reasons to limit boilerplate.
    static void
    slowDownCombat()
    Invokes the thread sleep functions during the Combat. encounter runtime to space out turns.
    static void
    slowDownText()
    Invokes the thread Sleep functions to slow down printing of the intro texts to highlight text printing during the setup.
